name: My GF is a Cam Model Sim
name_original: My GF is a Cam Model Sim
description:
A game made in 3 days. You take on the role of a significant other of a cam model. Follow her tasks to increase her horny meter and prepare her for work.

Download this expertly crafted experience below, unzip the folder, double click that EXE, and brace for the title of the century.

Version: 1.1
